alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Greenwood (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 7:10PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Abbeville and northwestern Greenwood Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 710 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Abbeville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Ware Shoals, Due West, Donalds, Cokesbury, Hodges, Shoals Junction, Lake Greenwood and Coronaca. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
